title: Communications
creator_credit: Art Babbitt, C Fouty and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Personnel Management”.
Shows the need for effective communication in industry, not only in sales and production operations, but also in matters concerning the whole plant and its personnel. In the absence of authoritative information, rumours flourish sometimes causing serious tension among personnel, as illustrated in this film.
